title: Red Candies
question_text: The Spittles company claimed that there were $20\%$ red candies in its fun-size packs and $20\%$ red candies in its jumbo size bags. A test was run where the proportion of red candies in $80$ samples of each size type were to be recorded. What would the mean and standard deviation be for the sampling distribution for this difference in sample proportions?
